formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ R_s = \frac{2Gm}{c^2} \] Where \( R_s \) is the Schwarzschild radius, \( G \) is the gravitational constant, \( m \) is the mass of the object, and \( c \) is the speed of light.
